Start comparison Stop comparison Start End Bad accuracy The accuracy of your GPS is low. We suggest you that you find yourself under the open sky. Please make sure that the location mode in the settings of your device is set to \'High accuracy\'. If not your tracked activity could be inaccurate. Do you want to proceed anyway? Dou you want to stop the comparison? Comparison finished You are not connected with the Play Services Unknown location We can\'t find your current location. We suggest you that you find yourself under the open sky or activate internet. Please retry it later .
